===New CodeHaus SVN repository===

*Browse the source code*

Explore the source code [http://fisheye.codehaus.org/browse/fest/ here].

*Anonymous*

Non-committer access is allowed over normal non-SSL WebDAV.

http://svn.codehaus.org/fest/trunk

*Committer*

Committer access over HTTPS + WebDAV is suitable for all users (including behind firewalls), although tends to be slower than SVN+SSH access. 

https://svn.codehaus.org/fest/

<br/>

===Old Google Code SVN repository===

You can browse the old SVN repository (at Google Code) [http://code.google.com/p/fest/source/checkout here].
